    Design - Principles & Patterns

    Have you ever wondered why snowflakes are created in a certain pattern or even a grain of sand?

    The simplest answer is: Efficiency

    Nature follows a certain pattern just to make sure it is efficient, take Fibonacci series for example, it is everywhere. Here is 3 other cool patterns, if you wanna learn more.

    We, as human beings learn everything from nature and apply those principles to every day lives. A part of those learnings are applied to software as well.

    We observed and understood certain patterns that happened again and again when solving a problem and grouped the solution patterns together forming Design Patterns

    Also, we found these patterns follow certain rules or principles and called them SOLID principles . Talk about finding patterns within patterns ðŸ˜„, I feel like Iâ€™m in The Matrix.

    There is a good book to learn these design patterns if you wanna give it a try.
